Posts.EditableText: Hiya, I'm not a Windows user, so I thought I could use the converter (online) but it results in just nothing Converted result - http://the-door.uk Original - http://textadventures.co.uk/games/play/ ... pzx1vm6_tg Any tips as to what I am doing wrong?

Posts.EditableText: The converter is not supported any more. You could perhaps check the generated Javascript files and rework the code of the game.
